title: TFG Financial Selects LeaseWave From Odessa Technologies
text:
TFG Financial Selects LeaseWave From Odessa Technologies August 25, 2015, 07:00 AM Related: Canada , LeaseWave , Odessa , Software 
TFG Financial Corporation has selected LeaseWave® from Odessa Technologies to deliver a centralized, end-to-end lease management solution. TFG is an equipment financing company headquartered in Burnaby, Canada. “To enable growth our goal is to implement modern technology. We selected LeaseWave because it fits this goal nicely. We are also excited about using LeaseWave to streamline our business and to pick up efficiency and productivity gains in the process,” said Geoff Hamilton, COO, at TFG Financial. “LeaseWave is engineered to be configurable, not just at implementation, but also on an ongoing basis as requirements change,” said Kate Majewski, Senior Vice President, Program Management at Odessa Technologies. “LeaseWave is built to be dynamic and yet rests on a very robust core. Our cutting-edge technology stack combined with mature functionality and workflow-based design, will enable TFG to realize significant efficiency gains and build reliable business controls across their operations.” Today's Other News
